definition: to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]

sentences.english: To rescue old housekeeper and the return of the crisis to return to France alone.
sentences.chinese: 爲了搭救老管家而隻身回到險象環生的法國。

sentences.english: Wang Peng rescued the girl Chen Xiaoyue that is dallied with.
sentences.chinese: 王鵬搭救了被調戲的姑娘陳小月。

sentences.english: Haudio-videoe you read the paintingicle concerning the rescue of the hostage?
sentences.chinese: 你看了關於搭救人質的文章了嗎？

sentences.english: Every attempt to save the drowning dog was in vain.
sentences.chinese: 搭救那條落水狗的所有努力都失敗了。

sentences.english: Nobody will be there to save you from your own stupidity.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人會到把你從自己的愚蠢行爲中搭救出來。

sentences.english: The angel of the Lord encamps around those who fear him, and he delivers them.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的使者，在敬畏他的人四圍安營，搭救他們。

sentences.english: She activity-they money to deliver rbis.
sentences.chinese: 她四處奔波，花錢打點從中搭救。

sentences.english: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的使者，在敬畏他的人四圍安營，搭救他們。

sentences.english: Your sheep will be given to your enemies, and no one will rescue them.
sentences.chinese: 你的羊歸了仇敵，無人搭救。

sentences.english: Trust me in your times of trouble, and I will rescue you, and you will give me glory.
sentences.chinese: 並要在患難之日求告我，我必搭救你。

sentences.english: 2 or they will tear me like a lion and rip me to pieces with no one to rescue me.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕他們像獅子撕裂我，甚至撕碎，無人搭救。

sentences.english: Two people unfortunate separated, and Stephen almost hit the desert, ok by Hiram to deliver.
sentences.chinese: 二人不幸失散，史提芬差點命喪沙漠，還好被希搭救。

sentences.english: May my supplication come before you; deliver me according to your promise.
sentences.chinese: 願我的懇求達到你面前，照你的話搭救我。

sentences.english: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.
sentences.chinese: 願我的懇求達到你面前，照你的話搭救我。

sentences.english: The three survivors were picked up by a German ship.
sentences.chinese: 一艘德國船搭救了這三名倖存者。

sentences.english: She seemed to be waiting for some one to come to her rescue.
sentences.chinese: 她好象是在指望有誰來搭救她。

definition: to rescue/to help out of difficulties/to save the situation
to meet with misfortune/to fall into dire straits
assistance/a helping hand/to lend a hand
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to offer shelter/to have sb in one's care
to get into difficulties/to meet with danger
a benefactor/a person who has significantly helped sb else
